id.description: The unique identifier for the custom audience.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook account associated with the custom audience.

approximate_count_lower_bound.description: An estimated lower bound count of the size of the custom audience.

approximate_count_upper_bound.description: An estimated upper bound count of the size of the custom audience.

data_source.description: Information about the source of the custom audience.

type.description: The type of data source used.

sub_type.description: The sub-type of the data source.

creation_params.description: Parameters used for creating the data source.

delivery_status.description: Status of the delivery related to the custom audience.

code.description: The code representing the delivery status of the custom audience.

description.description: Description of the delivery status of the custom audience.
Description or any additional information related to the custom audience.

is_value_based.description: Indicates if the custom audience is value-based or not.

lookalike_audience_ids.description: IDs of lookalike audiences based on this custom audience.

items.description: List of IDs of lookalike audiences based on this custom audience.

country.description: The country used as a basis for creating the lookalike audience.

ratio.description: The ratio of the lookalike audience.

type.description: The type of lookalike audience being created.

origin.description: Details about the original custom audience for lookalike creation.

id.description: The ID of the origin for the lookalike audience.

name.description: The name of the origin for the lookalike audience.

type.description: The type of the origin used for the lookalike audience.

name.description: The name given to the custom audience.

pixel_id.description: The ID of the pixel associated with the custom audience.

retention_days.description: The number of days data for the custom audience will be retained.

time_content_updated.description: The time when the content of the custom audience was last updated.

time_created.description: The time when the custom audience was created.

time_updated.description: The time when the custom audience was last updated.
